Listen to the excerpt.

The notation above is correct, but in the version you hear there is a voice-leading error. Which of the following statements accurately describes the error heard?

choices.label: The chordal seventh is approached by a descending leap.
The chordal seventh is approached by an ascending leap.
The chordal seventh is resolved down by a leap.
The chordal seventh is resolved down, not up.
